faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about EmotionEat

question1.q: Is my emotional eating data private and secure?
question1.a: Absolutely. Your data is encrypted with industry-standard security (HTTPS + database encryption). Your conversations about binge eating and emotional eating triggers are private and never shared. We don't sell your data, ever.

question2.q: How does EmotionEat help stop emotional eating?
question2.a: Our AI uses natural language processing to analyze your conversations and identify emotional eating patterns, binge eating triggers, and stress eating contexts. It detects triggers, recurring behaviors, and patterns to provide personalized strategies to overcome emotional eating.

question3.q: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
question3.a: Yes! Both free and premium plans have no commitment. Cancel your premium subscription anytime and keep access until the end of your billing period.

question4.q: Do I need experience with journaling to stop emotional eating?
question4.a: Not at all! Our AI chat makes tracking emotional eating feel like a conversation. Just talk about your day, binge eating episodes, or stress eating triggers naturally, and the AI guides you with helpful questions.

question5.q: What's the difference between free and premium for stopping emotional eating?
question5.a: Free gives you 10 chat messages per day and 1 emotional eating pattern analysis per week—perfect to start. Premium unlocks 50 messages daily, pattern explanations for challenges, plus daily analysis for faster progress overcoming binge eating and stress eating.

question6.q: Is EmotionEat a replacement for therapy for emotional eating disorder?
question6.a: No. EmotionEat helps you understand emotional eating patterns and build healthier habits, but it's not a substitute for professional medical or mental health care. For serious eating disorders like binge eating disorder, please consult a healthcare provider.
